畸.definition: lopsided; unbalanced; abnormal; irregular; odd fractional remnant

畸形兒.definition: deformed child; child with birth defect

畸戀.definition: improper love affair; unhealthy relationship (age-inappropriate, obsessive, incestuous etc)

畸胎.definition: a teratism; monster; severely deformed individual

畸零.definition: fractional part of a real number; odd fractional remnant; lone person; solitary
